sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import "../styles/About.css";
import profilePic from "../assets/profile.jpg"; // Replace with your actual image path

function About() {
  return React.createElement(
    "section",
    { id: "about", className: "about" },
    React.createElement("h2", { className: "section-title" }, "About Me"),
    React.createElement(
      "div",
      { className: "about-content" },
      React.createElement("img", {
        src: profilePic,
        alt: "Jose Chemmanoor",
        className: "profile-pic",
      }),
      React.createElement(
        "div",
        { className: "about-text" },
        React.createElement(
          "p",
          null,
          "Hi! I'm ",
          React.createElement("span", { className: "highlight" }, "Jose Chemmanoor"),
          ", a passionate ",
          React.createElement("b", null, "UI/UX Designer"),
          " and ",
          React.createElement("b", null, "Front-End Developer"),
          ". I love creating sleek, user-friendly interfaces with a futuristic aesthetic. My expertise includes ",
          React.createElement("b", null, "React, JavaScript, and CSS"),
          ", and I’m always exploring new technologies."
        ),
        React.createElement(
          "p",
          null,
          "Currently, I’m a ",
          React.createElement("b", null, "BTech student at RSET"),
          ", and I also work as a ",
          React.createElement("b", null, "Creative Associate at CSI Club"),
          ". My projects focus on combining ",
          React.createElement("b", null, "design and functionality"),
          " to create engaging user experiences."
        ),
        React.createElement(
          "p",
          null,
          "When I'm not coding, you’ll find me exploring new UI trends, working on ",
          React.createElement("b", null, "SafeCircle"),
          ", or designing futuristic visuals!"
        )
      )
    )
  );
}

export default About;
